flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=18>>18 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3.0>>3.0 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 18-3.0=<<18-3.0=15.0>>15.0 more ceilings to paint.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
